      • SubWindow

        public SubWindow(javax.swing.JFrame owner,
         java.lang.String title)
        Always specify owner and title. The window will be created non-modal.
        Parameters:
        owner - top level window
        title - for this window

      • SubWindow

        public SubWindow(javax.swing.JFrame owner,
         java.lang.String title,
         boolean modal)
        Constructor for modal subwindows (modal windows stay on top).
        Parameters:
        owner - top level window
        title - for this window
        modal - set to true for a modal window.

        Parameters:

      • placeOnScreen

        protected void placeOnScreen(java.awt.Point screenCenter)
        Positions this FileWindow on the screen. The position is choosen with respect to the specified screen center, the position of the owner and the position of the last visible subwindow of the owner, if any.
        Parameters:
        screenCenter - coordinates of the screen center

      • hasPeer

        protected boolean hasPeer()
        Returns true if another Window of the same type as this Window is currently open.
        Returns:
        true if another Window of same type is open.
